channel.title: Plugin Discovery Hub - New Plugins
channel.description: Stay updated with newly added Obsidian plugins

item.title: Chatty
item.author: Sadnan Saquif
item.description: Allows you to listen to your notes using text-to-speech. Uses the browser's built-in speech synthesis capabilities and your default system voices.

item.title: Tezcat
item.author: Max Margenot
item.description: Implements AI indexing and search to surface related thoughts to your current work. Look into the mirror.

item.title: Granola Sync
item.author: Tom Elliot
item.description: Sync Granola notes to your vault.

item.title: DaggerForge
item.author: Waleed Alnaimi
item.description: Easy access to DaggerHeart's Adversaries + creating your own.

item.title: Time Inserter
item.author: heycalmdown
item.description: Insert current time at cursor position, rounded to nearest 5-minute interval.

item.title: Ignore Filters Boost
item.author: lavton
item.description: Update excluded files from the file explorer.

item.title: Note Navigator
item.author: m
item.description: Streamlines note review by automatically navigating to the next note upon deletion. Adds commands to go to the previous and next note, respecting user-selected sort order.
